thread.title: Pet dog bursts into tears as his owner scolds him
thread.title_full: Pet dog bursts into tears as his owner scolds him

title: Pet dog bursts into tears as his owner scolds him
text: Share Cheese and his owner, Sun Yingying, live in Tianjin, eastern China. The video was filmed around last Christmas. The pet's owner returned home and discovered that her sofa had been torn by Cheese. Feeling furious, the owner is heard questioning the dog in a harsh tone: 'Cheese, who did this?' She then dragged the dog, which was wearing its Christmas costume, and put him in front of the sofa and started scolding him. The woman said: 'I don't care if you urinate and defecate on the floor at will. How could you do this?' She added severely: 'You can't spend three days peacefully without getting into trouble.' 'You even destroyed your makeup!' The owner, Sun Yingying, applied eyeliner and lipstick on Cheese and drawn eyebrows on his face. The woman and Cheese lives in Tianjin, China Apparently, the owner and her pets were celebrating Christmas. She explained in the video that she had applied makeup on Cheese the day before. The dog can be seen having two drawn-on eyebrows on his face. She critised the animal for smearing his lipstick and eyeliner while destroying the furniture. The woman picked up some cotton and said: 'Is this torn by you? It even has red (lipstick) on it.' As Cheese sat there listening to his owner scolding him, he started crying. However, his owner was not impressed by his apologetic tears. She said: 'Are you crying again? Take back your tears. Men shouldn't shed tears easily. Don't you know?' She then shouted at Cheese: 'Stop crying.' As Cheese sat there listening to his owner scolding him, he started crying. However, his owner said if it hadn't been for Christmas, she would have steamed him and eaten him The woman also threatened Cheese by saying that if it hadn't been for Christmas, she would have steamed him and eaten him with soy sauce. In an interview with Pear Video , Sun Yingying, the owner, said that Cheese had cried 'countless times' in two years. It was the second time Cheese had bitten into the sofa, according to the woman. She said: 'Every time when she told off the dog, he would cry.' Cheese is described by his owner as 'lazy'. She also said that 'he is not too naughty' and 'he likes biting'. The woman keeps four cats and two dogs. Read more:
